title: Building a Multi-Cloud (AWS & Azure) Resume Portfolio
excerpt: A comprehensive reflection of building a serverless resume website covering architecture, implementation, and lessons learned from the challenge.
author: Faza Billah
body_html:
The Cloud Resume Challenge is a hands-on project that teaches full-stack cloud engineering. I'll share my implementation, the technologies used, and the valuable lessons learned.

What is the Cloud Resume Challenge?

Created by A Cloud Guru's Forrest Brazeal, the Cloud Resume Challenge provides a structured project for learning cloud engineering. The goal: build a resume website hosted on cloud infrastructure using best practices.

Current Progress

Still developing...
